video.title: Emily Owens, M.D.
video.synopsis: In this medical drama series, klutzy intern Emily Owens discovers there's not much difference between working in a hospital and life in high school.

episodes.synopsis: As insecure Emily Owens begins her surgical internship at Denver Memorial, she realizes the hospital is a lot like high school -- cliques and all.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Emily is oblivious to her bad reputation among the nurses until one of them puts her on a difficult case as payback.
episodes.title: Emily and... the Alan Zolman Incident

episodes.synopsis: The surgical interns are given an impromptu medical quiz. Later, Emily reluctantly agrees to speak to a group of high school girls about safe sex.
episodes.title: Emily and... the Outbreak

episodes.synopsis: Emily and Micah scramble to help a patient who needs a kidney transplant but are bewildered when she turns down a kidney from her new husband.
episodes.title: Emily and... the Predator

episodes.synopsis: After Emily suffers a huge embarrassment in front of her colleagues, she follows Dr. Bandari's advice and tries to toughen up.
episodes.title: Emily and... the Tell-Tale Heart

episodes.synopsis: Emily is assigned to Dr. Bandari's deeply religious patient. Meanwhile, Tyra is finally ready to tell her father that she's a lesbian.
episodes.title: Emily and... the Question of Faith

episodes.synopsis: When the hospital's popular flower-delivery man collapses, Emily is perplexed by his refusal to accept treatment for his condition.
episodes.title: Emily and... the Good and the Bad

episodes.synopsis: When a female car-accident victim is brought to the emergency room, the staff immediately blames her boyfriend for causing her injuries.
episodes.title: Emily and... the Car and the Cards

episodes.synopsis: When a man dressed as a costumed character is admitted, Will automatically suspects the patient is psychotic, but Emily reserves judgment.
episodes.title: Emily and... the Love of Larping

episodes.synopsis: Dr. A.J. Aquino returns after a year away. But the chief insists that Aquino smooth things over with Dr. Bandari before rejoining the staff.
episodes.title: Emily and... the Social Experiment

episodes.synopsis: Emily, Will and Cassandra are the final candidates for a research assistant job. When they have to describe one another's flaws, feelings get hurt.
episodes.title: Emily and... the Teapot

episodes.synopsis: When a winter storm strikes, the hospital is flooded with victims from a bus crash, and Emily is assigned to run triage in the emergency room.
episodes.title: Emily and... the Perfect Storm

episodes.synopsis: Emily's decision to start a relationship with Micah becomes even more complicated when Will hears about it and begins feeling jealous.
episodes.title: Emily and... the Leap
